page.title: 04A Day In The Life -Mrs Chard
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LOCAL WOMAN Mrs. Chard is 38 and lives in Florida Terrace near our school.She is married and her husband works in a factory that makes food packets.She has three children,two girls and a boy.Two are at Somervale School and the other is on a Y.O.P.at the local sports centre. Mrs Chard rises at 7.30 and prepares breakfast for her children.Her husband works shifts so he may be there too. She works 3 mornings and 2 afternoons each week at a High Street fruit shop.She likes serving people and talking to them to find all the local news.She does her own shopping in the High Street.In her time off she enjoys walking and reading.She didn't enjoy her school days!Tea is made at 5.30 and then she watches T.V. and talkes to her family.She usually goes to bed about 11.00p.m.
